member.name: T:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverExplorerTask
member.summary: NAnt task for automating NCoverExplorer.Console.

example.code: <ncoverexplorer program="tools\ncoverexplorer\ncoverexplorer.console.exe” projectName="MyProject" reportType="3" outputDir="${build.reports}" xmlReportName="CoverageSummary.xml" htmlReportName="CoverageSummary.html" mergeFileName="CoverageMerged.xml" showExcluded="True" satisfactoryCoverage="80" failMinimum="False"> <fileset> <include name="coverage.xml" /> </fileset> <exclusions> <exclusion type="Assembly" pattern="*.Tests" /> <exclusion type="Namespace" pattern="MyApp.SomeNamespace" /> <exclusion type="Class" pattern="MyApp.SomeNamespace.SomeClass" /> </exclusions> <moduleThresholds> <moduleThreshold moduleName="MyApp.1.dll" satisfactoryCoverage="75" /> <moduleThreshold moduleName="MyApp.2.dll" satisfactoryCoverage="85" /> </moduleThresholds> </ncoverexplorer>

member.name: T:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask
member.summary: NAnt task for automating NCover.Console.exe, with both NCover 1.3.3 and 1.5.x support. Note that this task relies on CoverLib.dll being COM registered at the relevant NCover folder path location prior to being called.
member.example:
This example shows the standard profiling using NCover 1.3.3 for standard nunit tests with minimum arguments. Defaults are with no logging, profiling all assemblies, output filename of coverage.xml and this assumes that NCover and NUnit are in the path.
<ncover commandLineExe="${nunit.path}\nunit-console.exe" commandLineArgs="${build.path}\myapp.tests.dll" version="1.3.3" > </ncover>

This example shows the standard profiling using NCover 1.5.4 for standard nunit tests with minimal arguments. Defaults are with logging to coverage.log, profiling all assemblies, output filename of coverage.xml and this example specifies a full path to NCover.Console.exe.
<ncover program="C:\Program Files\NCover\ncover.console.exe" commandLineExe="${nunit.path}\nunit-console.exe" commandLineArgs="${build.path}\myapp.tests.dll" > </ncover>

This example shows the standard profiling using NCover 1.5.4 for a Windows application, specifying a coverage exclusion, verbose logging to a named file, specifically named log, output xml and html files. It also shows coverage exclusion attributes, overriding the NCover location to run from and a way of listing assemblies to be included in the profiled NCover results.
<ncover program="tools
cover
cover.console.exe" commandLineExe="${nunit.path}
unit-console.exe" commandLineArgs="myapp.tests.dll" coverageFile="myapp.coverage.xml" logLevel="Verbose" logFile="myapp.coverage.log" workingDirectory="${build.path}" excludeAttributes="CoverageExcludeAttribute" > <assemblies basedir="${build.path}"> <include name="myapp.*.dll" /> </assemblies> </ncover>

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the NCover version this task runs against. Different NCover versions have different command line arguments. The default is support for NCover 1.5.x by using "1.5", other supported versions at this time are "1.3.3".

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.CommandLineExe
member.summary: The command line executable to be launched by NCover (such as nunit-console.exe).

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.CommandLineArgs
member.summary: The arguments to pass to the command line executable to be launched by NCover (such as nunit-console.exe).

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.CoverageFile
member.summary: The filename for the output coverage.xml file (default).

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.LogLevel
member.summary: What level of NCover logging to provide. Values are "Quiet", "Normal" (default) and "Verbose". Note that due to a current bug in NCover 1.5.4 there is no different between Quiet and Normal since the //q argument (NoLog=true) will lock NCover. So logging is always on for NCover 1.5.4

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.LogFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the logfile name to write to if logLevel is set to anything other than "Quiet". The default is "coverage.log".

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the working directory for the command line executable.

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.CopyXsl
member.summary: Determines whether to copy the xsl file form the NCover folder to the output folder. Applies to NCover 1.3.3 only (NCover 1.5 onwards never copies the xsl). Default value is (for NCover 1.3.3).

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.ExcludeAttributes
member.summary: If coverage exclusion attributes have been applied (NCover 1.5.4 onwards) specify the full namespace to the attribute including the "Attribute" suffix - e.g. "CoverageExcludeAttribute" if defined in no namespace.

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.ProfileIIS
member.summary: Determines whether to profile under IIS (//iis). Default value is .

member.name: P:NAnt.NCoverExplorer.Tasks.NCoverTask.ProfileService
member.summary: The service name to profile if any (//svc). Default is none.

member.summary: Used to specify the assemblies to be profiled. To use see .
